name: FLIGHT COMMANDER
description:
Fly a Lufthansa Airbus A380 through 4 different airports in this arcade flight simulator!

Game inspired by the classics Jet de GO by Taito and Airline Pilots by Sega! Bringing the feeling of piloting a giant passenger plane!

Developed in the Coppercube engine, this game uses only simulated physics, as opposed to applied real-time physics, this game uses programming using vector motion to simulate all the control and flight action!

Apply maximum power and feel the powerful sound of the 4 Rolls-Royce Trent 900 turbofan engines, retract the landing gear, follow the electronic gps system and be fascinated by the technology and automation of the controls, supplied by the fly by wire system, which electronically the perfectly controllable and stable plane at your fingertips!

Andgameplay 2022, by André Luis.
